description:
Large, parka with synthetic lining that reaches down over the rear and thighs. The perfect winter garment for changing weather conditions, it protects against the wind and rain at the same time as the Supreme Micro Loft padding keeps you warm in really low temperatures. Detachable hood with soft fleece lining and warm synthetic fur trimming that protects against snowstorms. Many practical pockets, including two large zippered breast pockets, a pocket for a media player on the sleeve and two bellow pockets with hand-warming pockets at the hem.

On the inside, there are two mesh pockets, two media player pockets with openings for ear phones, safety pockets and one Napoleon pocket. Ribbed knitting at the neck keeps cold drafts out. Drawcord at the hem and long, two-way zipper with protective flap. Velcro adjustments at the sleeve cuffs.
name: Fjallraven Nuuk Parka - Mens
